00236 inline CVector2d CAffine2d::GetApply(const CVector2d& position) const
00237 {
00238        CVector2d result;
00239        m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(position, result);
00240 
00241        return result + m_translation;
00242 }
00243 
00244 
00245 inline void CAffine2d::GetApply(const CVector2d& position, CVector2d& result) const
00246 {
00247        m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(position, result);
00248        result += m_translation;
00249 }
00250

00257 
00258        return retVal;

00268 inline CAffine2d CAffine2d::GetTranslated(const CVector2d& vector) const
00269 {
00270        return CAffine2d(m_deformMatrix, m_translation + vector);
00271 }
00272 
00273 
00274 inline void CAffine2d::GetTranslated(const CVector2d& vector, CAffine2d& result) const
00275 {
00276        result.GetDeformMatrixRef() = m_deformMatrix;
00277        result.GetTranslationRef() = m_translation + vector;
00278 }

00309 inline bool CAffine2d::operator==(const CAffine2d& transform) const
00310 {
00311        return (m_translation == transform.m_translation) && (m_deformMatrix == transform.m_deformMatrix);
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00315 inline bool CAffine2d::operator!=(const CAffine2d& transform) const
00316 {
00317        return (m_translation != transform.m_translation) || (m_deformMatrix != transform.m_deformMatrix);
00318 }
